bibl.title: Are the Orphic Verses Quoted in PSI XV 1476 and in Diogenes of Babylon SVF 33 References to the Same Work?
bibl.note: P.S.I. XV, 1476 [= M.-P.3 1583.3; LDAB 1056]. - 1. Two references to the same text. - 2. The quote of Diogenes of Babylon. - 3. Orphics and Stoics.
bibl.seg: BERNABÉ Alberto, Are the Orphic Verses Quoted in PSI XV 1476 and in Diogenes of Babylon SVF 33 References to the Same Work?
